name: Osiris in Space
description:
Explore the space and find Osiris, but don't let him get you!

Platforms are randomly generated on every run.

This is a small game: a randomized level + boss. I hope you will enjoy it :3

This is my very first game! Made for MyFirstGameJam. The art and music I created myself.

Controls

Keyboard: AWD or arrows, space-bar, mouse.

Controller: LStick, Y & A (will be changed to A & X shortly)

Shortly I will add a timer, so you can try to beat the game as fast as you can! :D
